thread.title: Robin Williams’ widow, children reach deal over estate
thread.title_full: Robin Williams’ widow, children reach deal over estate - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Jenna Lyons
title: Robin Williams’ widow, children reach deal over estate
text:
Photo: Charles Sykes, Associated Press Robin Williams, right, and his wife, Susan, arrive to the 2012 Comedy Awards in New York. Attorneys for Robin Williams' widow and his children have reached a settlement in their legal fight over his estate.(AP Photo/Charles Sykes, File) Robin Williams, right, and his wife, Susan, arrive to the 2012...
Robin Williams’ widow and children have come to an agreement after a months-long battle over the late actor-comedian’s estate, attorneys for both sides said. Robin Williams, right, and his wife, Susan, arrive to the 2012 Comedy Awards in New York. Attorneys for Robin Williams' widow and his children have reached a settlement in their legal fight over his estate.(AP Photo/Charles Sykes, File) Robin Williams, right, and his wife, Susan, arrive to the 2012...
Robin Williams’ widow and children have come to an agreement after a months-long battle over the late actor-comedian’s estate, attorneys for both sides said.
